channel.title: Map3 Blog
channel.description: The best place to stay up-to-date with the latest Map3 news and events.

item.title: You can deploy Map3 on AliCloud and AWS now
item.description: Using a cloud platform is an easy way for you run a node on the network. Once you set it up you don’t need to keep your computer on. It is flexible and versatile; it can be controlled with any devices in any location that is accessible to the interne...
